dialogue.text: I know you're a bat, but is it really nessasary that you are flying right now while you and Boyfriend are rap battling?
You'd be surprised to know how rare it is to see me actually use my wings.
The last time I used my wings was 3 months ago, so I want to use it again.
Not to mention, it seems like we have a crowd of people watching us sing, so I figured I'd fly to make the rap battle more interesting.
I guess a rap battle between an anthro bat and a blue-haired guy is interesting enough to gather a crowd.
Beep ba bop dep skeedo dee bo bap.
Yeah, I agree. Let's sing one more song, and we'll make it as interesting as possible for the crowd.
